title: How to Create Bold and Italicized Text in HTML

steps.title: Open a simple text editing program such as either Notepad or WordPad on Windows, or, on a Mac open up TextEdit.
steps.content: Open a simple text editing program such as either Notepad or WordPad on Windows, or, on a Mac open up TextEdit.

steps.title: Type all preceding HTML text that you want before the bold and italicized text.
steps.content: Type all preceding HTML text that you want before the bold and italicized text.

steps.title: Open up the phrase you want bold and italicized with the <b> tag.
steps.content: Open up the phrase you want bold and italicized with the <b> tag.

steps.title: Open up the phrase that you want bold and italicized with the <i> tag.
steps.content: Open up the phrase that you want bold and italicized with the <i> tag.

steps.title: Type the text you want boldfaced and italicized.
steps.content: Type the text you want boldfaced and italicized.

steps.title: Type the closing tag for the italicizing, .
steps.content: Type the closing tag for the italicizing, . It's often times better to type the closing tag for the tag that lies inside before and work outwards, to make it easier on the eyes for a coder to recognize what style you are trying to perform.
